title: Are you ready to get twoshot by hail of blades jhin with stormrazor?
body: this is gonna be a hilarious patch

replies.body:
Is stormrazor and hail of blades on yi be decent?

Any autoattack champs that can do better off short trades or pokes.

Yi's renown for his "1v5" capability, so a burst rune isn't always the best idea on him

It's better on {{champion:82}} {{champion:421}}

Don't mind the bronze randomly using electrocute cause runes take some time to change and I don't know which was good for him. Don't play him often so I didn't copy a rune page for him. I didn't see much difference.
hail of blades is lul rune

No.
Cause I'll be the one doing the twoshotting.
